long_description: you may come to our office for a routine eye exam. during this visit, our optometrist will give you a visual acuity test. assessments are comprehensive and will also include an evaluation for astigmatism as well as an eye health screening. the care we provide also includes writing prescriptions for contact lenses and eyeglasses. we take the time to help you find the right brand of lenses or style of glasses to fit your lifestyle, needs, and budget. if you are diagnosed with a condition that will require surgical intervention, we can make sure you are prepared before referring you to an eye surgeon we trust.
